mapper.select: select from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO ORDER by HOUSE_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO ORDER by HOUSE_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(HOUSE_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(HOUSE_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO

select * from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO where HOUSE_ORDER_NUM = (select max(HOUSE_ORDER_NUM) from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO where HOUSE_ORDER_NUM<(select HOUSE_ORDER_NUM from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO where HOUSE_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO where HOUSE_ORDER_NUM = (select min(HOUSE_ORDER_NUM) from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO where HOUSE_ORDER_NUM>(select HOUSE_ORDER_NUM from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO where HOUSE_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select from TGRID_HOUSE_INFO where HOUSE_BUILD_ID=#{buildId} ORDER by HOUSE_ORDER_NUM ASC
